title: The Golden Boy - All I Ever Wanted is You
description: Ricky isn't quite sure he heard that right... did Mr. Golden Boy, Mr. Perfect and straight Brandon Mathews just ask Ricky to teach him about gay sex?Like many gay men and straight women, Ricky always thought of Brandon as the perfect package. He was beautiful inside and out, intelligent, wealthy and gorgeous to boot. While they were in high school, Ricky could only admire him from afar.Things change in college, where the two young men share many classes together and start becoming closer friends. They even start hanging out outside of school.On one of their free afternoons, they witness something that changes their lives forever: Brandon's 18-year-old neighbor Teddy, getting it on with another boy. What they see not only gets them hot, but also prompts an unlikely confession from Brandon...One, he's a virgin.Two, he wants to learn how to have gay sex - with Ricky!It's a dream come true for Ricky, and Brandon has always been an excellent student...
author: Dick Parker
